data.text: @FacundoSavala @indy_swim @PeteWishart If it’s not happening there is no justification in keeping the report and advice on its legality secret.
@FacundoSavala @indy_swim @PeteWishart "Might delay the vote"? There was never going to be a vote. Why are these deranged psychos allowed to get off with such lies and the msm happily regurgitate it.
@FacundoSavala @indy_swim @PeteWishart When it’s time to set up a smoke screen…. https://t.co/LxiJM1Kpsf
@FacundoSavala @Lesleygsmith3 @indy_swim @PeteWishart Peter Wishart is a player, not one who's been played.
@FacundoSavala @Jeanniewmd @indy_swim @PeteWishart And still the sheep will march to the top of the hill,believing Nicola Sturgeon will deliver independence
@FacundoSavala @indy_swim @PeteWishart Another day, another load of separatist cack from the King of Greggs.
@FacundoSavala @indy_swim @PeteWishart As dear old Benny Hill used to say.”what a road of cobras”😂

@FacundoSavala @indy_swim @PeteWishart Looks like it will be an actual generation before the next referendum takes place so 2039 at the earliest. 
IMO the next referendum should be around devolution.
